definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

sentences.english: A small glass of wine, or half a pint of beer is one unit.
sentences.chinese: 一小杯的葡萄酒或者半品脫的啤酒爲一個單位。

sentences.english: Each Czech drinks over 175 pints of beer a year on average.
sentences.chinese: 捷克平均每人每年喝酒175品脫。

sentences.english: It's just 300 calories for two pints, if you make it with water.
sentences.chinese: 如果是用水配製，2品脫的熱量只有300卡路里。

sentences.english: But it would have to feel like an existing pint glass to the consumer.
sentences.chinese: 對消費者來說，新款杯子同現品脫玻璃杯將會類似。
請來兩份半品脫苦啤酒。

sentences.english: The Caretaker is one of the classic masterpieces of this style.
sentences.chinese: 戲劇《看管人》是“品脫風格”的經典之作。

sentences.english: Attach the WFI schematic including all the pint of use.
sentences.chinese: 附上WFI示意圖，包括使用的品脫。
